ygData.subject: Re: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: I think a lot of people get the day after Thanksgiving off (I m self-employed so...) However when I wasn t self-employed - I worked for a Mutual Fund Company -
ygData.messageBody:
I think a lot of people get the day after Thanksgiving off (I'm
self-employed so...)

However when I wasn't self-employed - I worked for a Mutual Fund Company -
and our holiday days were determined when the New York Stock Exchange was
closed. The day after Thanksgiving is NOT a market holiday - so I had to
work..

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Joshua R. Moore <josh@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 1:44 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gnomestock '99


> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> /Agree
> Some of us have to work;)
